title: Dr. Ben Watson
subtitle: Many politicians are busy saying that fewer refugees with us means more help in the immediate area. Now, new figures show that fewer refugees in Europe have NOT necessarily meant more humanitarian aid in the surrounding areas. In 2018, there was an 8% drop in humanitarian aid. pic.twitter.com/FJ7FJN3RSd

title: Fr√©d√©ric Moreau
subtitle: A Dutch family in the fabrics trade built this 1930 mansion in Schaerbeek. Pacifists and anti-fascists, they sheltered refugees from Germany & Spain , then resistants during WW2. The father, Alex Eekman, was arrested in 1942 and murdered at the Mauthausen camp. pic.twitter.com/0bwZJ8jJGf
